segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing on a little stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into the open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of his hands is inside the jar grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other holds a plate, maybe to keep them from falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing next to him, reaching up with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks excited, waiting for him to share a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, hoping the woman doesn't catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is big and full, labeled clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is their little adventure in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is dangerous; he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open wide, framing the whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of cute, their teamwork for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR
